properties.entry: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_DT , MEMBER_NICK, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO,PROFILE_IMG FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO=? AND REPLY_ST='N' ORDER BY REPLY_NO

UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
